name: Bon-Bon
description:
Bon-Bon was one of the first projects I worked on. And it helped push me into the game dev pool overall. I kept it short and sweet (pun intended) as I was a beginner in unity. 

I don't plan to update the game; this is a demo. But in the future, I might revisit this Idea. I am also open for feedback and pointers of issues that may arise in the game. so don't hesitate to shout it out! 

Controls
  • Use the W and S key to move left or right. 
  • Use the  Spacebar to jump
  • Left click to shoot sweet bullets
